=== Stand ===

These people can attend (just sign up, we can fight^Wdistribute later):

* Wed 7. morning: AndrewLiyanage 100%, <nowiki>[[Bartux]]</nowiki> 100%,
* Wed 7. afternoon: AndrewLiyanage 100%, <nowiki>[[Bartux]]</nowiki> 100%,
* Thu 8. morning: ErwinHerrsche 100%, AndrewLiyanage 100%, TormodVolden 100%,
* Thu 8. afternoon: RashundaTramble 50%, ErwinHerrsche 100%, AndrewLiyanage 100%, TormodVolden 100%,

(the % is meant to kind of indicate how much time you can be there, and which days are best)

The entrance to the exposition is free, and it is possible to register online (on http://www.topsoft.ch) to avoid queing up at the entrance. The <nowiki>[[http://www.topsoft.ch/index.php?client=1&lang=1&idcatart=33|opening hours]]</nowiki> are 9-18 on Wednesday and 9-17 on Thursday.
